sentences.en: All decent people should be sickened by such a pointless waste of life.
sentences.cn: 凡正派的人都会痛恨这样无谓地浪费生命。

sentences.en: He felt sicken and spewed up onto the food.
sentences.cn: 他觉得恶心,把饭都吐了.

sentences.en: However, some times sometimes the virus can sicken humans.
sentences.cn: 然而, 有时也会使人患病.

sentences.en: However, sometimes the virus can sicken hummamshumans.
sentences.cn: 但是, 有时候这种病毒可以使人致病.

sentences.en: I began to sicken of the endless violence shown on television.
sentences.cn: 我逐渐对电视上无尽无休的暴力镜头感到厌恶.

sentences.en: In all sicken crowd, 70 % above are concerned with the mood.
sentences.cn: 在所有患病人群中, 70%以上都和情绪有关.

sentences.en: Odours, when sweet violets sicken , live within the sense they quicken.
sentences.cn: 甜蜜的紫罗兰已经开败,嗅觉中还留有它的芬芳.

sentences.en: Only 1 patient sicken allergic rhinitis in the whole group.
sentences.cn: 整群鼻咽癌病例中仅1例合并变应性鼻炎.

sentences.en: Only Mother Shipton - once the strongest of the party - seemed to sicken and fade.
sentences.cn: 只有席蒲顿妈妈 — 以前是他们中最坚强的 — 似乎虚弱、憔悴.

sentences.en: Syris Thalla fell! Her gardens rot and sicken . Fear me , undead host.
sentences.cn: 赛利斯塔拉陷落了! 她的花园正在变质和腐烂. 准备接招吧, 亡灵战士们.

sentences.en: The animal began to sicken and soon died.
sentences.cn: 这只动物患了病很快就死了.

sentences.en: The notion that art should be controlled by intellectuals sickened him.
sentences.cn: 艺术应该由知识分子掌控的观念使他很厌恶。

sentences.en: The thought of such cruelty sickened her.
sentences.cn: 想到如此残忍的行为，她就很愤慨。
我很讨厌他们做生意的手法.

sentences.en: They have no fear. Why do they sicken and die?
sentences.cn: 他们无所畏惧, 为什么他们也会患病、死去 呢 ?

sentences.en: They sicken of the calm, who knew the storm.
sentences.cn: 熟知风暴的人,厌恶宁静.----桃乐西?派克.

sentences.en: When not treated with reasonable respect it will sicken and die.
sentences.cn: 如果未被给予适当的尊重,它将病弱和消亡.

sentences.en: When the sicken child feel into asleep, the mother slipped in.
sentences.cn: 生病的孩子睡着后, 他妈妈蹑手蹑脚进来了.

words.tran_cn: 厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的
有病的，苍白的；疾病流行的；令人作呕的

trans.tran_en: If something sickens you, it makes you feel disgusted

trans.tran_cn: 使生病，使厌恶，使恶心，患病

trans.tran_en: to make you feel shocked and angry, especially because you strongly disapprove of something
